org.locationtech.geowave.core.store.api

Interface Index

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Persistable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AttributeIndex
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AttributeIndexImpl, CustomAttributeIndex, CustomIndex, CustomNameIndex, IndexImpl, NullIndex

    public interface Index
extends Persistable
    An index represents how to efficiently store and retrieve data. The common index model allows for easily searching certain fields across all types within an index. The numeric index strategy maps real-world values to insertion keys and query ranges for efficient range scans within a key-value store.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        get the name of the index
        Returns:
        the name of the index (should be unique per data store)

      • getIndexStrategy

        NumericIndexStrategy getIndexStrategy()
        get the index strategy which maps real-world values to insertion keys and query ranges for efficient range scans within a key-value store.
        Returns:
        the numeric index strategy

      • getIndexModel

        CommonIndexModel getIndexModel()
        The common index model allows for easily searching certain fields across all types within an index. For example, if geometry is a common index field, one could ubiquitously search all types within this index spatially. This could apply to any field type desired.
        Returns:
        the common index model
